prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, Drums, Organ, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, Drums, and Organ, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, Drums, and Organ are all present in this song, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, Drums, and Organ, with no Piano.
